content: pattern theluvpiggy theluvpiggy theluvpiggy abbreviations st = stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch increase = increase 2sc in one stitch decrease = decrease working on the front loop only 2sc together … = repeat instruction … = total number of stitches skill level beginner size i used cotton acrylic mix yarns 2 5mm crochet hook and 3mm safety eyes vincent the vampire bat turned out in approximate height 4cm head in black r1 magic_ring 6 single_crochet 6 r2 increase repeat 6 times 12 r3 single_crochet and increase repeat 6 times 18 r4 2sc and increase repeat 6 times 24 r5 3sc and increase repeat 6 times 30 r6 4sc and increase repeat 6 times 36 r7-r11 single_crochet 36 insert safety eyes on r8 with 4 stitches apart stuff the head as you go with polyester fiberfill r12 4sc and decrease repeat 6 times 30 r13 3sc and decrease repeat 6 times 24 r14 2sc and decrease repeat 6 times 18 r15 single_crochet and decrease repeat 6 times 12 r16 decrease repeat 6 times 6 stuff the head fasten_off and wave the yarn end ears make 2 in orange r1 magic_ring 4 single_crochet 4 r2 increase repeat 4 times 8 r3 single_crochet 8 fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing wings make 2 in orange r1 10ch 10 r2 9sc 1ch and turn 9 excluding the chain r3 starting from the second stitch 6sc 2ch turn slip_stitch with the beginning chain 6 excluding the chain r4 6sc 1ch and turn 6 excluding the chain r5 4sc 2ch turn slip_stitch with the beginning chain 4 excluding the chain r6 4sc 1ch and turn 4 excluding the chain r7 2sc 2ch turn slip_stitch with the beginning chain 2 excluding the chain r8 2sc 2 fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing assembly sew both ears at the top of the head sew the wings align with the eyes and ears for mouth use red yarn and sew a horizontal line with 6 stitches length for teeth use white yarn and sew vertical line with 1 stitch length for each tooth there are 4 stitches apart between the tooth theluvpiggy please note
